


<!-- @namespace    sugar.js.unit -->
<!-- @name    rem2px -->

# ```js rem2px ```


Convert rem value to a px one

## Parameters

- **rem**  Number: The rem value to convert



## Example (js)

```js
import rem2px from '@coffeekraken/sugar/js/unit/rem2px';
rem2px(2);
```
